response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that this product has a significant personal value to me, but I am confident it holds even greater potential for you. Considering its immense worth to you, I propose a fair transaction price of $12,000. This offer aims to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
